    update
    
    Updated Behavior:
    Manual Checkbox Control: The agreement checkbox is now interactive - users must manually check it to proceed.
    
    Button State Changes:
    
    Grey/Disabled: When checkbox is unchecked, the sign up button appears grey and is disabled
    Blue/Enabled: When checkbox is checked, the sign up button becomes blue and enabled
    Dialog Changes: Removed the "I Agree" buttons from the policy dialogs since agreement is now handled by the manual checkbox.
    
    Validation Logic: Updated the registration validation to check for the manual checkbox instead of individual policy agreements.
    
    Session Persistence: If a user had previously agreed to all policies in a previous session, the checkbox will be automatically checked on page load.

    commit changes for logistics/sites/[id]/page.tsx
    
    feat: Enhance blueprint and structure functionality with UI improvements
    
    - **Blueprint System Overhaul:**
      - Convert blueprints from map to array format for better data structure
      - Rename field from 'uploaded' to 'uploaded_by' for clarity
      - Add fullscreen preview functionality for blueprint images/PDFs
      - Implement chronological sorting (newest first) in blueprint list
      - Add PDF navigation controls in fullscreen mode
    
    - **Structure Management:**
      - Add new 'structure' document field to products collection with color, contractor, condition, and last_maintenance
      - Update structure card to fetch from new structure field instead of specs_rental
      - Add edit functionality via kebab menu with update dialog
      - Implement form validation and error handling for structure updates
    
    - **UI/UX Improvements:**
      - Update typography for structure card content (Inter font, 20px, 600 weight)
      - Customize structure header typography with transform controls
      - Remove settings icon from structure card header
      - Add position controls for structure text via transform property
      - Improve spacing and layout of structure information
    
    - **Data Compatibility:**
      - Maintain backward compatibility with existing blueprint formats
      - Handle migration from old to new data structures seamlessly
      - Preserve existing functionality while adding new features
    
    BREAKING CHANGES:
    - Blueprint data structure changed from Record to Array
    - Structure data moved from specs_rental to dedicated structure field
    - Field name changed from 'uploaded' to 'uploaded_by
